column8: Umno Youth wants RCI on Mahathir-era forex scandalUmno Youth wants the government to set up a royal commission of inquiry (RCI) to probe Bank Negara's losses in the foreign exchange market in 1991, when Dr Mahathir Mohamad was still the prime minister.Umno Youth vice-chief Khairul Azwan Harun claimed that the central bank had lost US$180 billion from forex trading exposures and forex trading losses, and had gone bankrupt.http://m.malaysiakini.com/news/371600
LOL. Macam budak kici la ini ahlil politaik.
